Features (Short overview)
-------------------------------------------------
- size of the mod (1000 MB gross)
- automatic installation
- more than 1700 textures replaced (inc. LOD)
- 100% of map in snow
- Snowfall (press CTRL+[Num+])
- Wetahercontrol (press 1 to switch on the Weather menue)
- Engine Start/Stop (press Page Up-key and Down-key)
- free movable Camera (press K)
- carspawner included (press 2)
- 270 installation options (Only with GAMI Version)
- 152 new vehicles
- 30 new clothes
- icicles
- NPCÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s do more drift crashes
- realistic handling
- photo-realistic snow textures
- footsteps on the pavement
- tracks on the drive lanes
- tracks during braking
- snow reflection on the vehicles
- Xenon and LED headlights
- adjusted sea water
- snow on tires
- new high-res interior textures
- additional vegetation
- adjusted objects
- new rims and tires
- new weapons
- new tuning parts
- new missions
- Vehicle Showroom in "Ottos Carsaloon"
- 13 eastereggs
- advertising panel
- start new game not necessary* (If you have GTA SA V1.00)
- and many many more!

ENGLISH:
-------------------------------------------------
This mod changes San Andreas in a winter wonderland. The concept behind this modification was the idea to
change the whole map. It was more than a year from te first steps until the final version and it can be
seen in many details. all the textures arenÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´t just white but fotorealistic, which makes more deep optic.
Most drive lanes have tracks, but itÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â´s not only one track, it is an overlay of many different profiles.
Also small details like icicle were attached. The grip is global reduced at 30% for all for all vehicles
and also those who may be installed afterwards.
Key bounds:
===========

Engine Start/Stop:
------------------------------------------------
Page Up-key to switch off
Page Down-key to switch on

Weather Menue:
------------------------------------------------
press 1 to switch on the Weather menue

Free moveable Camera:
-------------------------------------------------
press K to activate FLYCAM

with [forward] up
with [backward] down
with [GO_LEFT] turn left
with [GO_RIGHT] turn right
with [PED_CYCLE_WEAPON_LEFT] or [PED_CYCLE_WEAPON_RIGHT] swing up/down
with [PED_FIREWEAPON] foreward
with [PED_SPRINT] backward
additional [PED_JUMPING] to speed up the movement

Carspawner:
-------------------------------------------------
press key 2 to sitch on the carspwner
press forward/backward to switch from model to model
press Enter or Look Behind to confirm and exit


Enable Snow:
-------------------------------------------------
CTRL+[Num+] to toggle the different SnowFX Modes.
